snippet.title: Escape PS3 Hagrid Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the game here for free:
https://lolscrubs.itch.io/escape-ps3-hagrid

About:
You're playing as Harry Potter, who after the events of the prior games is trying to enter Hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry again to finish his career in magical education. In order to get into school again Professor Dumbledore sets up the most difficult task for Harry...

Play "Escape PS1 Hagrid": https://lolscrubs.itch.io/escape-ps1-hagrid
Play "Escape PS2 Hagrid": https://lolscrubs.itch.io/escape-ps2-hagrid

More games made by me: https://lolscrubs.itch.io/
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/home
